channel.title: Models add but now have problem giving item stats
channel.description: OK so i add a few new weps and armors to my server but idk how to give them stats like str bonus and stuff... their in the server and are in itemdef2.... their case's are the same a some items in item.java so idk how to fix this?

item.title: Models add but now have problem giving item stats
item.dc:creator: @Storm_Powner Storm Powner
item.description:
@Storm_Powner wrote:

go to item.cfg. just find the cases or make new ones make sure to use tabs. and add statts like

item 15 torva_full_helm a_torva_full_helm 0 0 0 5 6 7 8 9 0 3 5 23 1 5 43 5 53 5 3

Read full topic
item.source: Models add but now have problem giving item stats
